sentences.sContent: She made some extremely good points.
sentences.sCn: 她提出了一些很不错的观点。

sentences.sContent: There are three important points we must bear in mind.
sentences.sCn: 有三个要点我们必须记住。

sentences.sContent: This brings me to my next point.
sentences.sCn: 这样我就要讲到下一点了。

sentences.sContent: ...and recite something you are memorized to bring your mind to the point where is under control...
...Great leaders recognize the weak signals or slight signs that point to big changes to come...
...But is there a point where it reaches capacity...
...What could have been considered the beginning of a descent is now a potential turning point—the turning point you are most equipped to take full advantage of...
...he's surely right to point out that the problem is growing: "Google can give us the powerful illusion that all questions have definite answers"...
...There is no point saying you run marathons...
...A: But the point is the man was clocked-in at 8 o'clock...
...he or she may pass the point of easy control...
...The point is not to excuse or forget the crime...
...Do your contacts share your point of view on most subjects...
